posts.content:
CamperFest 2015 is back!!! What better for way to spend your Easter weekend than the opportunity to CAMP right in the heart of Chester, on the beautiful Chester Racecourse. The event will run on the 2nd - 6th April 2015.

As part of your stay you can visit, our ever popular Chester Food, Drink & Lifestyle Festival, lovely local bars, bistros and restaurants, as well as take a short drive to some local family attractions such as: Chester Zoo, Crocky Trails and the Blue Planet Aquarium.
In order to create the best experience possible there will be a number of different activities and smaller events held on site over the weekend.
The Chester Food, Drink & Lifestyle Festival is ranked the third largest payable (FREE to CamperFest Guests) Food & Drink Festival in the UK.

Do not miss an amazing opportunity and book your tickets now!

More information about an event can be found on the website: http://chesterfoodanddrink.co.uk/camperfest/
